de.fhg.fokus.restac.resource.wrapping.common
Class ObjectWrappingFactory

java.lang.Object
  de.fhg.fokus.restac.resource.wrapping.common.ObjectWrappingFactory

public class ObjectWrappingFactory
extends java.lang.Object

With an ObjectWrappingFactory developers can easily provide Java objects as remote REST services, and use such services through object wrappers.

Author:
Philippe Bößling, Anna Kress - changed on 01.06.07

Constructor Detail

ObjectWrappingFactory

public ObjectWrappingFactory()
Method Detail

registerObject

public void registerObject(java.lang.Object object)
Registers an object as remote REST service. The object should be annotated as rest resource. All methods to be exported for remote access should be annotated as resource methods.

Parameters:
object - - the object
See Also:
RestResource, RestResourceMethod

unregisterObject

public void unregisterObject(java.lang.Object object)
Unregisters object.

Parameters:
object -

getObjectWrapper

public java.lang.Object getObjectWrapper(java.net.URL url,
                                         java.lang.Class iface)
Creates a client side object wrapper for the given interface class.

Parameters:
url - url of object to be accessed
objClass - the interface class of the object
Returns:
a client side object wrapper
